summary: App draft has login/session loading issues; user requests removing the sign-in/access-code gate entirely to avoid blocked access.
architectural_notes: Authentication/sign-in gate (dashboard access code) should be removed per user request; app should be accessible without session-based login.
known_issues: App may fail to load even after sign out due to stale/invalid browser session after updates/redeploys.

existing_features.title: Remove the Internet Identity login requirement from the app bootstrap so the application can load and all routes can be accessed without signing in.
Remove the dashboard access-code gate flow so that access-code verification is not required to view or use the app (including removing the AccessCodeGate UI from the routing/bootstrap path).

Update navigation and recovery UI to remove sign-out actions that depend on authentication; replace them with a session reset action that clears local bootstrap/access-related state and reloads the app.

Remove or disable frontend features that require an authenticated “current user” context (e.g., current user profile/role queries and profile setup modal) so the app does not get stuck bootstrapping due to missing authentication.

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove sign-in/access-code flow entirely (no authentication gate) to allow app to load without login/session checks.
Remove backend-side authorization/sign-in enforcement that prevents anonymous users from calling the existing read/write APIs, so the frontend can operate without Internet Identity.

projectName: Remove sign-in and access-code gating so the app loads without authentication
